TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AutomationElementMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Contains values that specify the type of reference to use when returning UI Automation elements.

span.span: Contains values that specify the type of reference to use when returning UI Automation elements.

summary.span: These values are used in the property.

span.span: These values are used in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Completa es el valor predeterminado y especifica que los elementos devueltos contienen una referencia completa a subyacente [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].Full is the default, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. Ninguno especifica que los elementos devueltos no tienen ninguna referencia a la interfaz de usuario subyacente y contienen solo información almacenada en caché.None specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying UI, and contain only cached information. Ciertas operaciones en los elementos, como o , requieren una referencia completa; al intentar realizar estas operaciones en un elemento que no tiene ninguno da como resultado un .Certain operations on elements, such as or , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . Uso del modo ninguno puede ser más eficaz cuando sólo se necesitan propiedades, ya que evita la sobrecarga implicada en la configuración de referencias completas.Using None can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo establecer el modo en un .The following example shows how to set the mode on a . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#183)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#183](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#183)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode Full = int32(1)

summary.span: Specifies that returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

summary.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

span.span: Specifies that returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] and contain only cached information.

summary.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.

span.span: This mode might be used, for example, to retrieve the names of items in a list box without obtaining references to the items themselves.
